LanguageData.WolfTimber.label: 灰狼
LanguageData.WolfTimber.description: A rugged predator long feared by many ancient Earth cultures. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.WolfArctic.label: 北极狼
LanguageData.WolfArctic.description: An arctic variant of the old Earth wolf. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.Rimwolf.label: 黑狼
LanguageData.Rimwolf.description: These intelligent creatures have evolved from the wild wolves of Earth which were released on this backwater planet long ago. They are fearsome predators and can quickly overpower large prey that carelessly lets itself get surrounded by them.
